bdi4jade.belief

Class DerivedBelief<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
      • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief<K,V>
        • bdi4jade.belief.DerivedBelief<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<K,V>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DerivedPredicate

    public abstract class DerivedBelief<K,V>
extends AbstractBelief<K,V>
    This class represents a belief whose value is derived from other beliefs of a belief base. As a belief may be part of many belief bases, a main belief base is associated with this belief. The evaluation of the value of this belief is performed considering the belief of the main belief base.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DerivedBelief

        public DerivedBelief()
        The default constructor. It should be only used if persistence frameworks are used.

      • DerivedBelief

        public DerivedBelief(K name)
        Creates a new derived belief. The value of this belief cannot be set as it is derived from other values of a belief base.
        Parameters:
        name - the belief name.

    • Method Detail

      • addBeliefBase

        public void addBeliefBase(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Adds a belief base with which this belief is associated. If the main belief base of this belief is null, it sets the given belief base as the main belief base of this belief.
        Specified by:
        addBeliefBase in interface Belief<K,V>
        Overrides:
        addBeliefBase in class AbstractBelief<K,V>
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be added.
        See Also:
        AbstractBelief.addBeliefBase(bdi4jade.belief.BeliefBase)

      • evaluate

        protected abstract V evaluate()
        Evaluates the value of this belief, which is derived from beliefs of the main belief base associated with this belief.
        Returns:
        the value of this belief.

      • getMainBeliefBase

        public BeliefBase getMainBeliefBase()
        Returns the main belief base of this belief.
        Returns:
        the main belief base.

      • getValue

        public V getValue()
        Returns the value of this belief. If the main belief base is null, it returns null. Otherwise, the method evaluate() is invoked.
        Returns:
        the value of this belief.
        See Also:
        Belief.getValue()

      • removeBeliefBase

        public void removeBeliefBase(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Removes a belief base associated with this belief. If the belief base was the main belief base of this belief, this method sets a random belief base from the belief bases associated with this belief as the main belief base. If the removed belief base was the last belief base associated with this belief, the main belief base is set to null.
        Specified by:
        removeBeliefBase in interface Belief<K,V>
        Overrides:
        removeBeliefBase in class AbstractBelief<K,V>
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be removed.
        See Also:
        AbstractBelief.removeBeliefBase(bdi4jade.belief.BeliefBase)

      • setMainBeliefBase

        public void setMainBeliefBase(BeliefBase mainBeliefBase)
        Sets the main belief base of this belief. This method does not verify if the main belief base is one of the belief bases associated with this belief.
        Parameters:
        mainBeliefBase - the main belief base to set.

      • updateValue

        protected void updateValue(V value)
        This method throws a NullPointerException, as this operation is invalid for this belief. The value of this belief cannot be set as it is derived from other beliefs.
        Specified by:
        updateValue in class AbstractBelief<K,V>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to set.
